title: who is responsible for maintaining the parking lots where the county recycling bins are located?  i am asking specifically about the bins located behind Veterans Park near the Murray/Ashley school complex.  the lot is full of broken glass.  anyone attempting a dropoff is risking a flat tire.  is it on school property or park property?  in either case, wouldn\'t the county be responsible?  it\'s a mess.  P.S.--it would make a good photo.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=8115
